lyrics:
16 contributorsdo i lyricsverse 1
baby what are we becomin
it feels just like were always runnin
rollin through the motions every day

verse 2
i could lean in to hold you
or act like i dont even know you
seems like you could care less either way

prechorus
what happened to that girl i used to know
i just want us back to the way we were before

chorus
do i turn you on at all when i kiss you baby
does the sight of me wantin you drive you crazy
do i have your love am i still enough
tell me dont i or tell me do i baby
give you everything that you ever wanted
would you rather just turn away and leave me lonely
do i just need to give up and get on with my life
baby do i

verse 3
remember when we didnt have nothin
but a perfect simple kind of lovin
baby those sure were the days
see luke bryan liveget tickets as low as 40you might also likeprechorus
there was a time our love ran wild and free
but now im second guessin everything i see

chorus
do i turn you on at all when i kiss you baby
does the sight of me wantin you drive you crazy
do i have your love am i still enough
tell me dont i or tell me do i baby
give you everything that you ever wanted
would you rather just turn away and leave me lonely
do i just need to give up and get on with my life
baby do i

bridge
still give you what you need
still take your breath away
light up the spark way down deep
baby do i

chorus
whoa do i turn you on at all when i kiss you baby
does the sight of me wantin you drive you crazy
do i have your love am i still enough
tell me dont i or tell me do i baby
give you everything that you ever wanted
would you rather just turn away and leave me lonely
do i just need to give up and get on with my life
tell me baby do i get one more try
do i
baby do i10embed
